duties_responsibilities.duty: Delivering excellent community member service and leading Team Members to do the same, in our efforts to spread global wellness.
Supporting the Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager with opening, closing, and leadership duties.
Generating business results and achieving key KPIs including revenue and comp growth goals, AVS, IPT, traffic, conversion, and loyalty program growth.
Ensuring Team Members are equipped with the product knowledge they need to make intentional recommendations for Community Members.
Upholding presentation standards and assessing and action merchandising opportunities to elevate the in-store experience.
Taking a proactive and innovative approach to growing the business through community outreach.
Inspiring and uplifting the team through coaching, collaboration, and embodying core values.
Choosing culture first in everything done, with a commitment to personal growth and self-awareness.
Contributing to a team environment where all Team Members consistently experience a sense of belonging and inclusion.
